articles.title: It's Doctor Michelle Yeoh: Malaysian actress set to receive AFI Honorary Degree - The Star Online
articles.description: Yeoh will be conferred with a Doctorate Of Fine Arts by the American Film Institute (AFI) on Aug13.

articles.title: Jaguar Land Rover owner Tata Motors to buy Ford car plant in India - BBC
articles.description: The American motor industry giant announced last year that it would close its Indian car factories.
articles.content:
By Peter HoskinsBusiness reporter
Indian automaker Tata Motors has agreed to buy a Ford manufacturing plant in the western state of Gujarat for 7.26bn rupees ($91.5m).
